questions.questionText: Which of the following animals is known for its ability to change color as a form of camouflage?
What is the primary diet of a panda?
Which bird is famous for its impressive mating dance and colourful plumage?
What type of habitat do polar bears primarily inhabit?
The Amazon Rainforest is home to approximately what percentage of Earth's species?
Which of the following species is critically endangered?
Which animal is known for its ability to mimic the sounds of other animals and even man-made sounds?
What unique feature do marsupials have compared to other mammals?
choices: They have a pouch for carrying their young

questions.questionText: Which of the following animals uses echolocation to navigate and find food?
What is the primary cause of deforestation in the Amazon rainforest?
Which marine animal is known for its intelligence and complex social behaviour?
Which of these species is known to have a matriarchal social structure?
Which of the following is a keystone species?
choices: The Sea Otter in the Pacific Ocean
The Domestic Cat in Urban Areas

questions.questionText: In which layer of the ocean do most fish and marine life exist?
What adaptation helps camels survive in desert conditions?
choices: The ability to go without water for long periods
Large feet to walk on sand
Thick fur to block the sun

questions.questionText: Which of the following is not a type of biome?
What is the main reason for the decline of coral reefs around the world?
Which of the following animals migrate the longest distance anually?
Which of the following species can be found in every ocean of the world?
